plot: A man held prisoner in North Korea following the Korean War, organizes a resistance movement against the cruelty of the communist prisoners.
title: Cheoljomang
plot_es: A man held prisoner in North Korea following the Korean War, organizes a resistance movement against the cruelty of the communist prisoners.
